me mudal yoda gena gama nagaraya eka se diyunu kirimata awashya kadinam wyapruthi kriyathmaka kirima saha adhikshanaya kirima ema mahalekam karyalaya wisin itu kala yuthu athara sanwardhana katayuthu sadaha rajaya magin wen karanu labana mudal nisi salasmakata anuwa widhimath lesa waya karamin gramiya ha nagarika pradesha eka se diyunu kirimata awashya kadinam sanwardhana wadasatahan haduna ganima,kriyathmaka kirima saha adhikshanaya kirima mema mahalekam karyalaya wetha pawarena pradhana wagakima we.
